name: Girl Runner 3D
description:
Girl Runner is a new fun run game that is perfect for stress relief. You will join in a beauty run and choose the character of your girl, romantic or strong, fashion or fitness girl?
Let’s simulate the skinny girl in the Girl Runner to defeat girls who have shamed you in the past or robbed your boyfriend. This girl game 3D tends to be one of the best games of 2021 that you cannot miss.
This run race 3D has many items such as lipstick, sport equipment, perfume and makeup tools. If you want to be a romantic girl, you need to pick lipstick, perfume and makeup tools. If you like fitness and gym, sport equipment is extremely necessary for this run race 3D.
The gameplay of girl game 3D has smooth control. On the run healthy runway, you will make the life choice by choosing healthy food or fast food. If you eat too much fast food, you will be fatty. The destiny of your girl in this life simulator depends on the food you choose. Healthy food is the best way to become skinny. This beauty run is not just a fun run but also a fashion game. It is your life choice. Girl Runner 3D will entertain you with lively, and extremely effective stress relief!
Download now and enjoy Girl Runner!!!
publishers: XGAME SERVICE AND TECHNOLOGY JOINT STOCK COMPANY
